dnr-british-citizen.label: British citizenship
dnr-british-citizen.hint: Includes status letters, right of abode, confirmation of non-acquisition, the Windrush Scheme and applications to give up citizenship

dnr-further-leave.label: Further leave to remain
dnr-further-leave.hint: Includes FLR (M), FLR (FP), FLR (O), and FLR (HRO) applications

dnr-not-time-limit.label: No time limit or replacement settlement biometric residence permit

dnr-eu-settlement-scheme.label: Settled or pre-settled status under the EU Settlement Scheme

dnr-settlement.label: Settlement
dnr-settlement.hint: Also called ‘indefinite leave to remain’ or ‘indefinite permission to stay’

dnr-limited-leave-replacement-brp.label: Transfer of conditions or limited leave replacement biometric residence permit

dnr-full-name.label: Full name
dnr-full-name.hint: Enter the main applicant’s name exactly as it appears on their immigration document

dnr-dob.hint: Enter the date of birth as it appears in the main applicant’s immigration documents, for example 24 7 2000

dnr-nationality.label: Country of nationality
dnr-nationality.hint: This must match what is on the main applicant’s immigration document

dnr-visa-type.legend: What type of visa is the application for?

dnr-visa-type-talent.label: Exceptional talent visa
dnr-visa-type-talent.hint: Also called tier 1 in the points-based system

dnr-visa-type-skilled.label: Skilled worker visa
dnr-visa-type-skilled.hint: Also called tier 2 in the points-based system

dnr-visa-type-study.label: Study visa
dnr-visa-type-study.hint: Also called tier 4 in the points-based system

dnr-visa-type-temp.label: Temporary work visa
dnr-visa-type-temp.hint: Also called tier 5 in the points-based system

dnr-visa-type-turkish.label: Turkish national visa
dnr-visa-type-turkish.hint: Includes Turkish businessperson and Turkish worker visas

dnr-reference-number.legend: Which reference number can you provide?

dnr-record-number.label: Record number
dnr-record-number.hint: This is in the confirmation email you received when you submitted. For example, ROD123456789

dnr-case-id.label: Case ID
dnr-case-id.hint: The main applicant received this number when they applied. For example, 12345678

dnr-ho-reference-number.label: Home Office reference number
dnr-ho-reference-number.hint: This is on official documents, such as letters about your immigration status or biometric residence permit cards. For example, A1234567

dnr-payment-reference-number.label: Payment reference number
dnr-payment-reference-number.hint: This is on the letter the Home Office sent to the main applicant confirming they received an application

dnr-courier-reference-number.label: Courier reference number
dnr-courier-reference-number.hint: This includes Royal Mail reference numbers

dnr-unique-application-number.label: Unique Application Number (UAN)
dnr-unique-application-number.hint: This is on letters and emails from the Home Office

dnr-ho-reference-number.label: Enter the Home Office reference number

dnr-courier-reference-number.label: Enter the courier reference number
dnr-courier-reference-number.hint: Royal Mail reference numbers are between 9 and 27 characters long

dnr-email.label: Email address
dnr-email.hint: This is where we will send confirmation of your submitted report

dnr-telephone.label: Contact telephone number
dnr-telephone.hint: For international numbers, include the country code

dnr-further-leave-to-remain.legend: Which type of further leave did you apply for?
